-e ---

𓍇 ≈ 𓍉 S-T-P

𓍇 ⁿadze ⇔ axe 𒉽 𒆳 斤 𓌏

𓍇 at-ti 𒀜𒋾 hoe @ Elamite

𓈔 σκέπαρνον sképarnon 𓍇

𒀝𒆰𒇻 ak-kul-lu adze, hatchet, pick(axe) ⇔ 𒀠𒇻 al-lu hoe, pickaxe

𓈖 𓍇 𓏌 𓏲 𓈗||water| nv-az-ur nvather : Nass Wasser 𓍇𐀍jo
𓈖 𓍇 𓏌 𓏲 𓈗||water| n-jo-ur نهر nahr nāru 𓍇𐀍jo 𓈖 nv nνv niktor(greek)=victor(Latin) nwater nwadi
𓈖 𓍇 𓏌 𓏲 𓈗||water| nwater nauter

𓎡 𓏮 𓈖 𓂝 𓈖 𓍇 𓏌 Canaanites
